name: Earthbound Immortal Aslla piscu
text:
Neither player can Summon "Earthbound Immortal" monsters. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if there is no face-up Field Spell on the field, destroy this card. If there is no face-up Field Spell, these effects are negated.
● This card can attack directly.
● Unaffected by your opponent's Spell/Trap effects.
● Your opponent's monsters cannot target this card for an attack, but can attack directly if this is the only monster you control.
● If this card leaves the field, except by its own effect: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls, then, inflict 800 damage to your opponent for each monster that was destroyed by this effect.
